content:
Pokémon is a great choice! Pokémon Sword is an amazing game, and it's awesome that you're already making progress. Completing the Pokédex is a challenging but rewarding task, and it's great that you're aiming to catch 'em all!

Reaching the third gym is a good milestone, and I'm sure you're enjoying the journey so far. The Wild Area is such a great addition to the series, and it's amazing to see how the Pokémon roam freely in the wild.

Which starter Pokémon did you choose? Grookey, Scorbunny, or Sobble? And have you found any rare or shiny Pokémon yet?

Completing the Pokédex is a long-term goal, but it's so much fun to explore the Galar region, battle gym leaders, and catch new Pokémon. You'll have to be strategic about which Pokémon to catch, trade, and breed to complete your collection.

If you need any tips or advice on completing the Pokédex or tackling the gyms, feel free to ask! What's your favorite Pokémon so far, and which ones are you looking forward to catching next?

Also, have you considered playing Pokémon Shield as well, or are you focusing on Sword for now?
